channel.title: Well i think ill be reported for the third time
channel.description:
What happened: I was a king. Found non ally member. he claimed that hes mercenary. So they preclaimed that im evil. so i got salty and outed my checks. I dont want to get a ban because i had terrible followers.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Well they suppoed exe him but everyone pardoned. its not first time when unseen claims merc. Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. 2. 3.
